mainSequence.step: Developer deploys a new dataset type version
Dataset Management System checks the current version from Version Control
Version Control returns the current version details to Dataset Management System
Dataset Management System registers the new version in the Dataset Type Registry
Dataset Type Registry confirms successful registration to Dataset Management System
Dataset Management System updates the available versions list with Dataset Instance Manager
Dataset Instance Manager confirms the list update to Dataset Management System
Dataset Management System isolates the impact of the new version in the Dataset Type Registry
Dataset Type Registry confirms the impact isolation to Dataset Management System
Dataset Management System creates a branch for the new version in Version Control
Version Control confirms the successful branch creation to Dataset Management System
Dataset Management System assigns the new version to new instances through Dataset Instance Manager
Dataset Instance Manager confirms the usage of the new version in new instances to Dataset Management System
Dataset Management System informs the Developer about the successful deployment of the new version
